info.name: VectorColour
info.comment: This is a stub class for use with the Vector module's DrawPath() function.

description.p: VectorColour is a stub class for exclusive use with the Vector module's DrawPath() function, for use in either the StrokeStyle or FillStyle parameters. VectorColour allows the path to be drawn with a solid colour, as specified in the Red, Green, Blue and Alpha fields.
The alpha component value, measured from 0 to 1.0. The default is 1.0.
The blue component value, measured from 0 to 1.0. The default is 0.0.
The green component value, measured from 0 to 1.0. The default is 0.0.
The red component value, measured from 0 to 1.0. The default is 0.0.
